openDescoPortalMsg: This will copy your account ID "{{accountNo}}" to the clipboard and open the official DESCO customer portal in a new tab. You can then paste your account ID to log in.
deleteAccountMsg: Are you sure you want to delete account "{{accountNo}}"? This action cannot be undone and all account data will be permanently removed.
balanceWarningMessage: Balance information is temporarily unavailable for account(s): {{accountList}}
tip1: Tip: You can view your monthly trends in the dashboard below.
tip2: Did you know? AI can help you optimize your electricity usage!
tip3: Tip: Recharge before your balance runs low to avoid interruptions.
aiAnalysisMayTakeTime: This may take a few moments due to the complexity of the analysis.
aiAnalysisStillWorking: Still working‚Ä¶ Sorry for the delay! Sometimes this takes a bit longer.
balanceUnavailableMsg: Your balance information is currently unavailable. Balance-related insights are not included in the analysis below.
name: Name
balanceInfoUnavailableDesc: Balance info is currently unavailable. Possible reasons:
balanceInfoAutoUpdate: Info will update automatically when available.
appSubtitle: Be wise with your Desco account: your electricity accounts, simplified.
noAccountsSubtitle: You haven't added any electricity accounts.
sectionInfoDescription: Learn how this section can help you understand and manage your electricity usage.

aiInsightsInfo.title: AI-Powered Insights
aiInsightsInfo.description: Get personalized, actionable suggestions based on your usage patterns. Use these insights to identify opportunities for savings, efficiency, and smarter electricity habits.
aiInsightsInfo.example: Example: 'Your usage increased 25% this week due to AC running longer. Try setting temperature to 26¬∞C instead of 24¬∞C to save ‡ß≥400/month.'
aiInsightsInfo.useCase: Check this section daily to get personalized tips for reducing your electricity bill and optimizing your usage patterns.
benefits: Discover unusual consumption trends and get tips to optimize usage.
Receive AI-driven recommendations for reducing your bill.
Spot inefficiencies or potential issues early.
tips: Enable AI insights in settings for personalized recommendations
Act on the suggestions to see real savings on your bill
Check for critical alerts that need immediate attention

consumerInfoInfo.title: Consumer Information
consumerInfoInfo.description: Review your account and location details. Ensuring this information is accurate helps you receive relevant insights and support.
benefits: Verify your account details for accurate billing and service.
Update information to receive tailored advice.
Understand your tariff and eligibility for special programs.

accountBalanceInfo.title: Account Balance
accountBalanceInfo.description: Monitor your current balance to avoid unexpected power interruptions. Stay proactive by recharging before your balance runs low.
accountBalanceInfo.example: Example: 'Current balance: ‡ß≥850. Based on your usage, this will last approximately 12 days. Consider recharging by March 15th.'
accountBalanceInfo.useCase: Check this daily to know when to recharge and avoid unexpected power disconnection. Use the AI insights to optimize your balance duration.
benefits: Prevent service disruption by tracking your balance.
Plan recharges to avoid last-minute rushes.
Spot unusual deductions or errors early.
tips: Recharge before your balance gets critically low
Monitor the 'days remaining' to plan ahead
Use AI recommendations to extend your balance duration

consumptionChartInfo.title: Consumption Chart
consumptionChartInfo.description: Visualize your electricity usage over time. Identify high-usage periods and adjust habits to save energy and money.
benefits: Spot spikes in usage and investigate causes.
Compare usage across days, weeks, or months.
Set goals to reduce consumption during peak times.

rechargeHistoryInfo.title: Recharge History
rechargeHistoryInfo.description: Track your recharge patterns and spending. Use this history to budget better, spot any missed or duplicate payments, and verify the success of your last recharge.
benefits: Identify your average monthly recharge amount.
Plan recharges to align with your budget.
Detect any irregularities in payment history.
Check if your last recharge was successful.
Use the details button to see how much energy cost you actually received and view a full breakdown of charges.

comparisonChartInfo.title: Comparison Chart
comparisonChartInfo.description: Compare your usage or spending with previous periods or similar users. Use this to benchmark your efficiency and set improvement targets.
benefits: See if your usage is above or below average.
Motivate yourself to improve by tracking progress.
Identify months where you performed best.

rechargeVsConsumptionInfo.title: Recharge vs Consumption
rechargeVsConsumptionInfo.description: Understand how your recharges align with your actual consumption. Ensure your payments are keeping up with your usage to avoid running out of balance.
benefits: Balance recharges with actual usage for smoother service.
Spot months where you may be over- or under-recharging.
Adjust recharge habits to match consumption trends.

rechargeDistributionInfo.title: Recharge Distribution
rechargeDistributionInfo.description: See how your recharges are distributed over time. Use this to identify patterns and optimize your recharge schedule.
benefits: Find the most common times you recharge.
Optimize recharge timing for convenience or discounts.
Avoid frequent small recharges by planning ahead.

maxDemandInfo.title: Max Demand
maxDemandInfo.description: Track your peak electricity demand. Reducing peak demand can lower your bill and reduce strain on the grid.
benefits: Identify when your demand is highest and why.
Shift heavy usage to off-peak times if possible.
Avoid exceeding demand thresholds that may incur extra charges.

cumulativeConsumptionInfo.title: Cumulative Consumption
cumulativeConsumptionInfo.description: Monitor your total electricity usage over time. Use this to set long-term goals and track your progress toward efficiency.
benefits: See your overall consumption trend.
Set annual or seasonal reduction targets.
Celebrate milestones in reduced usage.

boxPlotInfo.title: Box Plot
boxPlotInfo.description: Analyze the distribution and variability of your electricity usage. Spot outliers and understand your typical consumption range.
benefits: Identify days with unusually high or low usage.
Understand your typical usage range to set realistic goals.
Spot patterns that may indicate faulty appliances.

monthlyCostTrendInfo.title: Monthly Cost Trend
monthlyCostTrendInfo.description: Track how your electricity costs change month to month. Use this to budget and find ways to reduce your bill.
benefits: Spot months with higher costs and investigate causes.
Track the impact of efficiency improvements on your bill.
Forecast future costs for better financial planning.

clickToAddNewAccount: Click to add a new DESCO account
accountAlreadyAdded: Account {{accountNo}} is already added. Please use a different account number.
accountVerifiedSuccessfully: Account verified successfully! Review the details below.
aiInsightsDescription: AI Insights provide personalized energy and recharge analysis for your account.
banglaLanguageDescription: Enable Bangla to view account details and insights in Bangla.
settingsCanBeChangedLater: You can change these settings later.
dataUpdateNotice: Data is updated daily and shows information up to the previous day. Today's data will be available tomorrow, according to DESCO's schedule.
footerLine1: Data comes from the DESCO open API.
privacyDisclaimer1: This app is <bold>{{affiliation}}</bold>. It is provided for your convenience only.
privacyDisclaimer1_affiliation: not affiliated with or endorsed by DESCO
privacyDisclaimer2: We <bold>{{storage}}</bold>. All information is processed locally in your browser and never leaves your device.
privacyDisclaimer2_storage: do not store or persist any of your account data on our servers
privacyDisclaimer3: Your data is used solely to display your account information and is never shared with third parties.
privacyDisclaimer4: For more information, contact the developer.
apiKeySecurityDesc1: Your Google Gemini API key is encrypted using AES-256 encryption and stored only in your browser's local storage.
apiKeySecurityDesc2: We never transmit, store, or have access to your API key on our servers.
apiKeySecurityDesc3: The key remains completely under your control and can be removed at any time.
supportOrConnect: Support me or connect with me:
thankYouSupport: Thank you for your support! ‚Äî Aabir
onboardingSubtitle: Your smart companion for managing DESCO electricity accounts with AI-powered insights and simplified monitoring.
beyondOfficialPortalDesc: While DESCO has an official portal, DescoWise offers a more intuitive, user-friendly experience with AI-powered insights that help you understand your electricity usage patterns and optimize your consumption.
privacyFirstDesc: Your data never leaves your device. All processing happens locally in your browser, ensuring complete privacy and security of your account information.
aiInsightsFeatureDesc: Get personalized analysis of your consumption patterns and smart recommendations.
smartAnalyticsDesc: Visual charts and trends to understand your electricity usage better.
costOptimizationDesc: Predict bills and optimize recharge timing to save money.
securePrivateDesc: Your data stays on your device. No servers, no tracking.
bilingualSupportDesc: Full support for both English and Bangla languages.
realTimeDataDesc: Get the latest balance and consumption data from DESCO APIs.
step1Desc: Enter your DESCO account number. We'll verify it and fetch your account details.
step2Desc: View your balance, consumption trends, and AI-powered recommendations.
step3Desc: Use the insights to optimize your electricity usage and save money on bills.
importantNoteDesc: DescoWise is an unofficial client that uses DESCO's public APIs. It is not affiliated with or endorsed by DESCO. This app is provided for your convenience and offers enhanced features beyond the official portal.
dataReliabilityDesc: Understanding how we get your account information and what to do when data seems incorrect.
dataSourceDesc: DescoWise gets all your account information directly from DESCO's official systems. We don't have any special access or different data than what DESCO provides.
dataLimitationsDesc: Sometimes DESCO's systems may not show the most current information. This can happen due to:
dataLimitationReason3: Recent meter readings or account changes
dataLimitationNote: These same limitations affect DESCO's official portal and mobile app as well.
whatToDoDesc: If you notice information that seems incorrect or outdated:
whatToDoAction1: Check your physical meter directly for the most accurate reading
whatToDoAction2: Contact DESCO support at 16262 for official assistance
whatToDoAction3: Wait for the next data update (usually within 24 hours)
whatToDoAction4: Use DESCO's official portal as an alternative reference
dataAccuracyNote: We show warnings when data might be unreliable, but always verify critical information with your meter or DESCO directly.
aiUnavailable: AI insights are temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
aiRateLimit: AI insights are temporarily unavailable due to high demand. Please try again in a few minutes.
aiTooMuchData: There is too much data to analyze at once. Please try with fewer accounts or a shorter time range.
aiNetworkIssue: AI insights could not be loaded due to a network issue. Please check your connection and try again.
aiSafetyBlock: AI insights could not be generated due to content restrictions.
aiGenericError: Sorry, something went wrong while generating AI insights. Please try again later.
sharedAccountMessage: This account was shared with you. What would you like to do?
shareAccountDashboard: Share this account's dashboard with others
sharingTip1: Recipients can view your dashboard without adding the account
sharingTip2: They can choose to add the account to their own list
sharingTip3: Your data remains private and secure
aiInsightsDistributedToPanels: AI insights are now distributed across relevant sections below
checkIndividualSections: Check individual panels for specific insights and recommendations
apiKeyNotConfiguredTooltip: Click to configure your Google Gemini API key for AI features
aiFeatureRequiresApiKey: AI features require a Google Gemini API key to function.
clickToSetupApiKey: Click here to set up your API key and unlock AI insights.
apiKeyRequiredForAi: API key required for AI features
whyApiKey: Why do I need an API key?
aiFeatureBenefit1: Get personalized consumption insights and recommendations
aiFeatureBenefit2: Detect unusual usage patterns and potential issues
aiFeatureBenefit3: Receive predictive billing and usage forecasts
aiFeatureBenefit4: Access smart energy-saving tips tailored to your usage
apiKeyPrivacyNote: Your API key is encrypted and stored locally on your device. It never leaves your browser.
generalSettingsDescription: General application settings and preferences will be available here.
tourWelcomeContent: DescoWise can provide intelligent insights about your electricity consumption using AI. Let us show you how to get started.
tourBenefitsContent: AI insights include: personalized consumption analysis, anomaly detection, smart recommendations, predictive billing, and energy-saving tips tailored to your usage patterns.
tourPrivacyContent: Your API key is encrypted with AES-256 and stored only on your device. It never leaves your browser and you have complete control over it.
tourManageContent: You already have an API key configured. You can update, validate, or remove it anytime from the settings.
tourSetupContent: Click below to set up your Google Gemini API key and unlock all AI features. The process takes less than 2 minutes.
helpOverviewDesc: DescoWise is your smart companion for managing DESCO electricity accounts. Get real-time balance information, consumption insights, and AI-powered recommendations to optimize your electricity usage.
helpStep1: Add your DESCO account number from the main page
helpStep2: View your account dashboard with real-time data
helpStep3: Set up AI features for personalized insights (optional)
helpStep4: Explore different sections for detailed analysis
aiInsightsDesc: Get personalized consumption analysis, anomaly detection, and smart recommendations.
shareFeatureDesc: Share your dashboard with family members or track multiple accounts.
officialPortalDesc: Quick access to DESCO's official portal for payments and other services.
aiFeatureIntro: Unlock intelligent analysis of your electricity consumption patterns with Google Gemini AI.
aiSetupDesc: To use AI features, you need a free Google Gemini API key. Your key is encrypted and stored only on your device.
dashboardTip1: Click on section headers to expand/collapse different views
dashboardTip2: Use the settings menu to customize which sections are visible
dashboardTip3: Share your dashboard link with family members for easy access
privacyTip1: All data is processed locally in your browser
privacyTip2: API keys are encrypted with AES-256 encryption
privacyTip3: No personal data is stored on external servers
helpSubtitle: We're here to help you every step of the way
elderlyWelcomeDesc: This app helps you easily check your electricity bill and usage. We'll guide you through everything step by step.
whatCanYouDo: What can you do with this app?
checkBillBalanceDesc: See how much electricity bill you have remaining and when it was last updated
getSmartTipsDesc: Receive helpful suggestions to save electricity and reduce your monthly bill
shareWithFamilyDesc: Let your family members also check the electricity bill from their phones
stepAddAccountDesc: First, you need to add your DESCO electricity account number to the app.
stepAddInstr1: 1. Look for the "+" (plus) button on the main page
stepAddInstr2: 2. Click on it to open the account form
stepAddInstr3: 3. Type your electricity account number (found on your bill)
stepViewDashboardDesc: Once added, you can see all your electricity information in one place.
stepViewInstr1: 1. Click on your account card to open the dashboard
stepViewInstr2: 2. You will see your current bill balance
stepSetupAIDesc: Enable AI features to get personalized tips for saving electricity.
stepAIInstr1: 1. Look for the "AI Key" button at the top
stepAIInstr2: 2. Click "Setup API Key" if you want smart tips
stepAIInstr4: 4. Start receiving personalized electricity saving tips
followStepsDesc: Follow these simple steps to get started. Take your time!
exploreAllFeatures: Explore everything this app can do for you
realTimeDataElderlyDesc: Check your current electricity bill balance, see when it was last updated, and track your usage patterns over time.
veryConsistent: Your usage is very consistent - great job!
tryToMaintainConsistentUsage: Try to maintain more consistent daily usage
goodUsagePattern: Keep up the good usage pattern
criticalBalanceRecommendation: Your balance is critically low. Recharge immediately to avoid service disconnection.
lowBalanceRecommendation: Your balance is getting low. Consider recharging within the next few days to avoid any interruption.
highPeakRecommendation: Your peak usage is significantly high. Try to avoid using multiple high-power appliances simultaneously during peak hours.
moderatePeakRecommendation: Your peak usage is moderately high. Consider spreading out the use of heavy appliances throughout the day.
essentialViewDesc: Key information you need daily: balance, AI insights, consumption, and recent recharges
analysisViewDesc: Detailed analysis and comparisons to understand your usage patterns and trends
historyViewDesc: Historical data and advanced analytics for comprehensive usage review
allViewDesc: Complete dashboard with all available sections and detailed information
smartRecommendationsDesc: Get personalized suggestions to reduce your electricity bill and use energy more efficiently.
familySharingDesc: Share your electricity information with family members so everyone can stay informed about the bill.
troubleshootingDesc: Common questions and solutions to help you use the app easily
cantFindAccount: I can't find my electricity account number
cantFindAccountAnswer: Your electricity account number is printed on your monthly DESCO bill. It's usually a long number (10-12 digits) at the top of the bill. If you can't find it, ask a family member to help you locate it on the bill.
accountNotWorking: My account number is not working
accountNotWorkingAnswer: Make sure you've entered the correct account number without any spaces or dashes. The number should be exactly as shown on your DESCO bill. If it still doesn't work, the account might be new or there might be a temporary issue with DESCO's system.
dataNotUpdating: My bill information is not updating
dataNotUpdatingAnswer: The app gets information directly from DESCO. Sometimes there might be a delay in updates. Try refreshing the page or checking again after a few hours. The app will show you when the information was last updated.
howToPayBill: How do I pay my electricity bill?
howToPayBillAnswer: This app only shows your bill information - it doesn't handle payments. To pay your bill, you can use the "Official Portal" button to go to DESCO's website, visit a DESCO office, or use mobile banking services like bKash, Nagad, or Rocket.
appTooSmall: The text is too small to read
appTooSmallAnswer: You can make the text larger by using your phone's zoom feature. On most phones, you can pinch the screen with two fingers to zoom in. You can also increase your phone's font size in the Settings app.
needMoreHelpAnswer: Ask a family member or friend who is familiar with smartphones to help you. You can also visit a DESCO customer service center for assistance with your electricity account.
emergencyContactDesc: For electricity emergencies or urgent issues with your connection:
aiRefreshError: Failed to refresh AI insights. Please try again.
someMonthsMayHaveIncompleteData: Some months may have incomplete data
netBalanceExplanation: Net Balance shows the difference between recharges and consumption for each month. This reflects your prepaid electricity account's monthly activity.
positiveMonthExplanation: Recharges exceeded consumption - you added more credit than you used
negativeMonthExplanation: Consumption exceeded recharges - you used more electricity than you recharged that month
notificationDescription: Get notified daily at 3:00 PM BDT about low balances and data issues
lowBalanceThresholdDescription: Get notified when account balance falls below this amount
notificationTimeDescription: Daily check time in Bangladesh timezone (BDT)
enableNotificationsInBrowser: Please enable notifications in your browser settings to receive alerts.
unlockAiInsightsDescription: Get personalized consumption insights, anomaly detection, smart recommendations, and predictive analytics by configuring your Google Gemini API key.
apiKeyValidated: API key validated and saved successfully!
visitGoogleAiStudio: Visit Google AI Studio to create a free API key.
aes256Encrypted: AES-256 encrypted before storing in your browser
staysOnDevice: Stays on your device - you have complete control
canBeRemoved: Can be removed anytime from settings
removeApiKeyConfirmation: Are you sure you want to remove your API key? This will disable all AI features until you configure a new key.
aiInsightsWillBeDisabled: AI insights will be disabled for all accounts
smartRecommendationsWillBeUnavailable: Smart recommendations will no longer be available
consumptionAnalysisWillBeLimited: Consumption analysis features will be limited
canReEnableAnytime: You can re-enable by adding a new API key anytime

apiKeySetup.title: Enable AI Insights (Optional)
apiKeySetup.description: To unlock AI-powered consumption insights and personalized recommendations, provide your Google Gemini API key. This step is optional - you can skip it and still use all other features.
apiKeySetup.skipMessage: Don't want to set this up now? No problem! You can always add your API key later through the settings menu whenever you're ready.
apiKeySetup.howToGetKey: How to get your API key
apiKeySetup.step2: Sign in with your Google account
apiKeySetup.step3: Click "Create API Key" and copy it
apiKeySetup.step4: Paste it above and click "Validate & Continue"
